name: Emerging Sensing Technologies Summit 2016 (ESTS'16)
content: The first Emerging Sensing Technologies Summit (ESTS), (http://ests16.org/), will be held in Melbourne, Australia from 7 to 9 December 2016\. The summit is chaired by Prof. Jugdutt Singh (Sense-T, Australia) and hosted by the International Innovative Research Network. ESTSâ€™16 will bring together key researchers from our region and around the world to share the latest advances in sensing technologies development for different applications such as health and medicine, energy, military, aviation, astronomy, automotive, agriculture, environmental monitoring and mining. The main themes of the summit are: bio-chemical sensing; physical sensing; and sensor networks.
